text:
If your account access has been deactivated, it's likely due to a violation of our [content policy](https://labs.openai.com/policies/content-policy) or [terms of use](https://labs.openai.com/policies/terms).



If you believe this happened in error, please start a conversation with us from the Messenger at the bottom right of the screen. Choose the "DALL·E" option, select "Banned User Appeal" and include a justification for why your account should be reactivated.  
​
title: Why was my DALL·E 2 account deactivated?
